description.raw:
Similar to [this](#!/osrf/cloudsim-auth/pull-requests/6/https/diff) pull request for `cloudsim-auth` and [this](#!/osrf/cloudsim-portal/pull-requests/18/https/diff) one for `cloudsim-portal`.

* Serve on http by default. Beanstalk's load balancer will be the one serving https.
* Add two `ebextension` files which together configure the beanstalk https. Explanation about them will be added to the [wiki](#!/osrf/cloudsim/wiki/HTTPS) soon.

Currently Codeship deployed the http branch and you can see that it is live in https://dev.cloudsim.io/ . Before this PR is merged, I'll change the deployment pipeline to use the default branch instead.

Currently Codeship deployed the http branch and you can see that it is live in https://dev.cloudsim.io/ . Before this PR is merged, I'll change the deployment pipeline to use the default branch instead.
